storyInfo: Maria has grown in popularity, and popularity brings problems. Zofia advises her to quit while she's ahead. They argue, and Zofia slams the door.

attributes.content: And this is your glass.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Thank you. Thank you.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: The Roar Guards Company offers a wealth of beverages to its members. I truly envy them. They possess the luxury of standing here and observing each knight's magnificent display.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Tell me. You are a good person, correct?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Have you broken the law before?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Have you ever committed a wrongdoing?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: No, of course not, never...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: So in other words, you are a diligent worker who earns his pay for himself and his family. Doesn't that make you a good person?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Y-Yes, if you put it that way, I'd definitely be a good person, a good person like so many others in Kazimierz...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Indeed, so many others. Here. Let us toast to the good people.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Ah. Cheers.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Tell me. If there were some who sought to deprive good people of their work, to deprive good people of their way of life, could those possibly be good people, now?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: What do you...?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Even the countryside farmers, done tending their fields for the day, will look forward to that competition knight broadcast from the city.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: For hundreds of thousands... possibly millions of Kazimierz's industrial people, the Major is a part of life. And they are all good people, by and large, my friend.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: So, you mean...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Suppose, one day, the Major was gone... that overnight, the business had vanished.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Who would now support our campaign knights' expenditures, which grow annum by annum? Who would vie for Kazimierz's economic standing, and so stave off foreign incursions?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: My friend, tell me. Are those who would see that happen—bad people?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: You are a good person, and they would deprive you of your own living to crown their ancient sense of 'honor.'
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: We all rely on others to pave the way. We've given the vast majority—even the Infected—the chance to live...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: And so those 'bad people' would ignore that, their country and all its citizens, for their own inconsequential, self-centered consolation.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: My friend. You are a good person, correct?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: This place is Nearl's regular bar, right? Whoo-wee, now this is what I call Kazimierzey!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, Boss! Think Maria Nearl might come here today?
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: That's down to your own square luck.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Business been good lately?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Thanks to Maria.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: When's the last time we got so many in here? Back with Zofia?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Knight's the magic word. Most people're here just for that. Don't even ask me which of the media monkeys said it...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Not happy even for the money?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Wasn't the idea to give the two of them somewhere nice and quiet to relax?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hey, Marcin. Think about carving it into this seat here, 'Kowal ONLY.' Don't wanna wait for a spot next time I come by.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Cough up a naming fee and I'll agree.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Whoa, whoa, Nearl's really here! It's literally her!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Quick! Don't let the chance slide, go get a picture!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Er, thanks, thanks... picture? You mean me? Sorry, I'm a little...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Alright, alright, make way, you lot—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hold on... you're Zofia! The 'Whislash' Zofia!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, the rumors were true! 'Whislash' Zofia is the actual coach of the new Nearl!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Miss Zofia! I've watched your matches before! They really shook me!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: (Oh, well, we're done for.)
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: (A-Auntie! Think of something, quick!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria, I love you!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: What did you just say?!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, take your fights outside.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You've gotta be at least this old to brawl in here.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: —Mister Kowal! Mister Vogelweide!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: All customers, listen up! To celebrate our two old regulars and their outstanding performance, prices today are all 20% off!
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Everybody sit down and get your orders ready! All drinks and snacks are limited supplies only! Once we're out, we're out!
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Discounts? Could it get any better?
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Hold on... hold on... the bald guy there, you think he's...
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Just old Marcin, nothing more. Go on. What's your business?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Marcin...? You're the real 'Tremoriron' Marcin... *sobbing*... Today's just too blessed... Give me a 'Marcin Special'...
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: F... finally... I've never seen this place so lively before...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Bless your heart, Marcin. I'll help you recoup the costs later.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hah hah hah. If you think 20% off'll sink my bar, you'd be selling old Marcin short.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Crafty hand, you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: W-What? Can I keep drinking or not?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Place's empty, old boy. Who're you even drinking with?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: I—*geurgh*—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Don't throw up here—do it outsi—God! Your old damned bones!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Let's get down to business, then. Closing hours and all.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Closing hours are where we're booked in, hm?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hah hah hah, they're when this little bar's really open for service.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Maria... you've gotten enough points already.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You've been winning fight after fight. It's incredible.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Th... there's been an element of luck to it...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: As long as you can maintain the score, dig your heels in on it until the end of the season, that'll be the best plan... But I'm worried about something else.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Auntie?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Maria, the next match is a race. Races don't make for great changes in points, so it should be a safe bet.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: And then after that, don't participate in any more matches.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Wha?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: B... but, just staying...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You've done plenty enough. Victory's at hand now.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Surely you've noticed it too... Maria, a lot of people are paying attention to you right now.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: We just need to keep the pace. Wait until the points are finalized, and you'll win a knight's title, and we'll have achieved our goal.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Okay? Just listen to your sister. This will all be for the best—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But this... this isn't going to change anything at all... If I don't keep going, the Nearl family's still going to be stuck in this position...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Uncle Młynar wouldn't approve of doing things this way, either...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Młynar? He's like talking to a brick wall! He wouldn't approve no matter what you decided to do. You know that better than anyone, don't you?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Just don't think about it too much, okay? Maria... this is all for the best. It's this or nothing.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Auntie... what happened?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You don't know how deep the Major really goes... You don't know what it is you'll be up against at all...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Auntie!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...In the arena, victory will never belong to a knight. Victory will only ever belong to Kazimierz, belong to... to the corporations.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If you truly don't want to work with them, you shouldn't have joined the Major in the first place. If we keep doing things your way... Maria, we need to know where to stop.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Zofia. What did you find out?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...That Słoma employee I know told me about some rumblings. Maria's popularity has thrown her into the Knights Association's executive sights far sooner than anyone else...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If Maria doesn't stop where she should, they'll start making moves! No matter what it is they're planning for us, we don't have to grin and bear any of it!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: So, Maria, listen to your sister, okay?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I... I don't get it... If we don't want to be controlled by them, we have to bow to them? Where's the difference?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria! This is no joking matter—!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I know—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You could die in the arena!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...'Flametail' said so too. I haven't seen what the significance of the Major really is...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I know I might genuinely have no idea what cruelties she was referring to... but I didn't enter the tournament for fun, either!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I don't care about injuries, I don't care about accidents, I don't even care if I have to sacrifice—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That's enough!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ah... I'm really sorry, Auntie, I didn't mean...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That's not a 'sacrifice' at all. And I don't want to watch you suffer for any of this, either...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I see how you're thinking. You really need to learn when enough is enough!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...I don't think I should stop here.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Even if I don't pass the qualifiers, even if I fall short of my goal, I should be fighting for my own cause... I should be striving to win until I can't win anymore!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Alright, I get it.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Auntie...!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I'm convinced you should stop. You don't understand the Major. You can't understand... the sheer outrage Margaret's actions caused back then.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If Kazimierz really was a fair country, everything you've said could be true. But that's not how it goes. Any idiot can see how flimsy all our rules are, and how trivial it is to leave them in pieces.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You're still an untitled, unaffiliated, independent knight, Maria. I can apply to the Knights Association for a suspension on your tournament campaign.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: So there.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Auntie!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Cool down, Maria. And let Zofia cool down a little too.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: She means you well.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But Zofia's right. A knight doesn't win the Major by will alone.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: The corps were only interested in giving 'the new Nearl knight' the chance to take root and start growing. When they decide to reap you, they'll come out with their sickles, no second thoughts.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Knights get one right, and it's to apply to the events... beyond the Major, corps have every rank and result in vice grips. Knights don't get a choice any way or how.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: If Zofia's heard the truth, and the company insiders are making noise...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Maybe we should be picking up on the signals. Paying attention, at least.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Weugh... whassappenin'? Swear I saw Zofia storming out just now...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What's the long face for, girl? Didn'tcha win? What's to argue after winning?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: You two, stop making it worse...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...I-I'm going home.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I have a race coming up, and I still need to do my equipment maintenance...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (She's beautiful, but she carries the scent of blood... is she a knight?)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Maria Nearl. Young... even younger than she looked in the material.)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (Shame.)
attributes.name: Maria & Platinum
